text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria pseudoplatyphylla is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in Kenya and Tanzania.
text.Sources: Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. (1998). "Psychotria pseudoplatyphylla". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T34457A9869836. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T34457A9869836.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
